name: The Panda Has Landed
body:
### Welcome to PandaMeat's club for cool cats.

This is a cooool blog for cooool people. Check it, man. Are you tired of being the office chump? Do you seek to prove your worth without actually doing any work?

Well, you've come to the right place.  Let Mr. PandaMeat take good care of you. You're home now. Right where I want you. At home. With me.

P.S. If you know of some hookups for scoring some panda meat, give me a call. I'll be waiting.
